#####################################################
#!This file is autogenerated by the CBTek Code Base Manager
#####################################################

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.8.12)
project(SourceGen)

get_filename_component(PROJECT_ROOT ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR} PATH)

set (CMAKE_MODULE_PATH "${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/cmake")

include(${CMAKE_MODULE_PATH}/flags.cmake)
include(${CMAKE_MODULE_PATH}/build.cmake)

set(LIBRARY_TYPE STATIC)

set (ENABLE_COMMON_UTILS_UNIT_TESTS ON)
set(ENABLE_SGEN_UTILS_STATIC_LIB ON)
set(ENABLE_COMMON_UTILS_STATIC_LIB ON)
set(ENABLE_SGEN_QT ON)


if (WIN32)
    if (ENABLE_SGEN_QT)
        set (PLATFORM WIN32)
    endif()
endif()

include_directories("${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/common")
include_directories("${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/products/sgen")
add_subdirectory("${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/common/utility")
add_subdirectory("${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/products/sgen/sgen_utils")
add_subdirectory("${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/products/sgen/sgen")
if (ENABLE_SGEN_QT)
	add_subdirectory("${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/products/sgen/sgen_qt")
endif()
